entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 14 with temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 14 with temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
